data:
Here is the table classifying the risks associated with PREVENT-IA into High, Medium, Low, and Discarded categories along with the mitigation plans for each classified risk:

```markdown
| Risk                                   | Classification | Mitigation Plan                                                                                                        |
|----------------------------------------|----------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Negative public opinion on the use of AI| High           | - Develop a transparent communication strategy about the benefits and security measures of using AI.                 |
| Energy consumption                     | Medium         | - Optimize the platform for energy efficiency and explore renewable energy sources for cloud services.                |
| Dependence on AI model providers       | High           | - Diversify AI model suppliers and develop in-house AI capabilities as a backup.                                      |
| Unfriendly interfaces                  | Medium         | - Conduct UI/UX testing with real users and continuously iterate based on feedback.                                   |
| Lack of feedback                       | Medium         | - Implement a robust feedback system and actively solicit user input to improve the platform.                         |
| Poor prioritization of functionalities | High           | - Use Agile methodologies to prioritize features based on user needs and business goals.                              |
| Low visibility on social media         | Low            | - Develop a social media marketing strategy and engage with industry influencers.                                     |
| Difficulty in measuring training quality| Medium         | - Develop clear metrics and use data analytics to track and measure training effectiveness.                          |
| AI use regulations                     | High           | - Stay updated with AI-related regulations and ensure compliance through regular audits and legal consultations.      |
```
